author: sandygao
msg: Moving the calls to ValidationManager#reset() to the classes where it gets
created. It was called in DTD validator, but in the case where there are more
than one DTD validator, it'll get called more than once; and when there is no
DTD validator, it won't get called.

author: elena
msg: DTD validator should pass the namespace context object to the next component.

author: sandygao
msg: A bug: we didn't send characters to the document handler if
schema-normalize-value feature is on, but the text doesn't need to be

author: andyc
msg: Fixed typo bug introduced with XMLComponent changes.

author: andyc
msg: Removed UTF-8 BOM that was confusing StyleBook.
